name: Demonic Statue of the Outer Path
title: Deity
description: The Demonic Statue of the Outer Path (外道魔像, Gedō Mazō) is the husk of the Ten-Tails that remained after its chakra was separated from its body. Sealed in the moon, it is used as a container for tailed-beast chakra and strives only to regain the chakra taken from it.
naturalAbilities: Sensory Type: can sense chakra signatures (range = ROP + Will)
Husk of the Jūbi: grows and gains +10 to all stats per large thresholds of absorbed Bijū chakra; fully awakens after major absorption
